name: Flying Realities
description:
Hello there, here is a new Alpha game, this was created it for the #GoedaWareGameJam with the theme of Alternate Realities and Time is power.

Here is a Multiverses Flight Simulator, where constantly will be changing universes in the Flight, you have 2 games modes, Exploration, where you can enjoy more the view of the different Universes ans search the easter eggs hidden e.e or play the time survival, where you must follow some rngs to gain more time of flight before it shut down the system, in this game mode the software of the fligth is standart and wil be more bugged each time tyou travel to another universe.

Hope you enjoy this crazy idea, because i was planning the Race mode, but dont have the time to do the AI xd, but will try to work on it

Extra Info: The file is a .rar, i cant upload the unziped file because of its size, and if you want you can dowload the game from this link too.

https://www.mediafire.com/file/sz2uxzwvexhq5bf/Flying_Realities.rar/file

Thanks and hope you like it x3
